 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוּשׂ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂישׂ‎</span> **verb** ==exult, rejoice== ([[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xxxvii(1893), 536</sup> derives ('perhaps') from interjection, as <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> an enticing call, so [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>20</sup>); — 

**Qal*****Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂשׂ‎</span> [[Deut.28.63|Deut 28:63]] +, 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂשְׂתִּי‎</span> [[Ps.119.14|Ps 119:14]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָשִׂישׂ‎</span> [[Deut.28.63|Deut 28:63]] +, 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשֻׂשׂוּם‎</span> [[Isa.35.1|Isa 35:1]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:47n»§ 47n</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 510</sup>, but <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ ם‎</span> erroneous. [[BDB#Kenn|Kenn]] [[BDB#Ol|Ol]]<sup>§ 244 a, probably dittograph</sup>, so [[BDB#Lo|Lo]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup> [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]), etc.; ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂישִׂי‎</span> [[Lam.4.2|Lam 4:2]], masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂישׂוּ‎</span> [[Isa.65.18|Isa 65:18]]; [[Isa.66.10|Isa 66:10]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוֺשׂ‎</span> [[Isa.61.10|Isa 61:10]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָשׂוּשׂ‎</span> [[Deut.30.9|Deut 30:9]] — ***exult, display joy***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***over***, [[Deut.28.63|Deut 28:63]] (twice in verse); [[Deut.30.9|Deut 30:9]] (twice in verse); [[Jer.32.41|Jer 32:41]]; [[Isa.62.5|Isa 62:5]]; [[Zeph.3.1|Zeph 3:1]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשִׂמְחָה‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גִּיל‎</span>), [[Ps.119.162|Ps 119:162]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> [[Isa.61.10|Isa 61:10]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוֺשׂ אָשִׂישׂ‎</span>), [[Isa.65.19|Isa 65:19]]; [[Ps.35.9|Ps 35:9]] (all \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גּיל‎</span>) [[Ps.40.17|Ps 40:17]]; [[Ps.68.4|Ps 68:4]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשִׂמְחָה‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָלַץ‎</span>), [[Ps.70.5|Ps 70:5]] (all \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂמַח‎</span>; [[Ps.119.14|Ps 119:14]]; [[Job.39.21|Job 39:21]] (horse), [[Ps.19.6|Ps 19:6]] (sun, as athlete); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי‎</span> and clause [[Lam.1.21|Lam 1:21]] absolute [[Isa.35.1|Isa 35:1]]; [[Isa.65.18|Isa 65:18]] (both \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גִּיל‎</span>), [[Isa.64.4|Isa 64:4]] (but strike out <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂשׂ וְ‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup> [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]), [[Isa.68.14|Isa 68:14]]; [[Lam.4.21|Lam 4:21]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂמַח‎</span>), [[Job.3.22|Job 3:22]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂמַח אֱלֵיגִֿיל‎</span>), [[Isa.66.10|Isa 66:10]] (accusative of congnate meaning with verb; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גִּיל‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂמַח‎</span>). — [[Ezek.21.15|Ezek 21:15]] is corrupt, [[BDB#Co|Co]] reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְאַנְשֵׁי‎</span> (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשִׂישׂ‎</span>), [[BDB#Krae|Krae]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִנְשִׂיאֵי‎</span>, other conjectures in Commentaries: on clause see especially [[BDB#Da|Da]] Toy<sup>Heb.Hpt</sup>.
